attributes.action: Shut Down The Web Site e-goat, it is not productive!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Immedeately shut down the website e-got as it is not productive in it's nature, it is merely a channel for expression of anger. It is also leaking too many military secrets.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
